name: Chill Backpackers
description:
Located in Brisbane City Centre just a short walk from the Roma Street Bus & Train station, Chill offers air-conditioned rooms, off street parking available at 328 Roma Street via the Parkable app. Fast free Wi-Fi and three great common areas to relax, with fabulous scenic views of the Brisbane City River.

'This hostel delivers city & river views like no other Brisbane hostel. There is a movie room too, but why not kick back with a cocktail on one of the fabulous decks'.

Chill is situated near Brisbane's best spots: Southbank, Roma St Parklands, The Queen Street Mall, The Treasury Casino, Suncorp Stadium, XXXX Brewery, markets, cinemas, nightlife, supermarkets and more. Ask our friendly reception for any recommendations. 

Never be bored! board games and PlayStation, sun-loungers, a pool table and a table tennis table. Our high-speed Wi-Fi is FREE and unlimited and is available all over the hostel.

Driving to us? We have parking available next to the building via the Parkable app, search for "328 Roma Street" We advise booking in advance. Anyone parking without paying will be towed by Parkable, the release fee is $285, and Chill Management is unable to contest or reduce this fine.

Our reception is available from 8am until 11pm. 
Check-in is available after 3PM. We do not offer an early check-in and late check-in is subject to availability please enquire if you are arriving outside of reception opening hours.
Check-out is before 10AM. To check out you must bring down your bed sheets and return the keycard, late check-out fees apply.

Chill is located in a safe part of the city centre in a well-lit street nicknamed "Backpackers Paradise" and has state-of-the-art CCTV security and fire detection systems operating 24/7. 

Please note that we are an 18+ venue and international passports are required for check-in. In the interests of security, all guests are required to produce government photo ID at check-in. Persons wishing to stay in our backpacking dormitory accommodation are required to have with them a full-sized traveller's backpack (65 ltrs or above).

Management reserves the right to refuse entry to any guest and does not need to give a reason. If you are refused entry, you will be refunded in full regardless of policy. Guests who are evicted for breaking house rules are not entitled to a refund and any funds paid will be forfeited.
hostelworldSays: The clean and quiet Chill Backpackers is an easy walk from most of downtown Brisbane. In fact, this hostel has excellent views over the city and the river from its rooftop terrace. It also has laundry facilities, a jobs board, car parking, a pool table and more. Several Hostelworld guests have told us that "the roof top is a great place to get in contact with others, for pre-gaming and to chill".

houseRules.notes:
Check-in/Check-out Policies

This property has the following check-in and check-out times and policies:
Check-In: 3:00 PM
Check-Out: 10:00 AM
Late Check-out Hour: 12:00 PM
Late Check-out Fees: $20.00

Late check-out (after 10:00 AM and before 12:00 PM) may result in a fee.

Property and Cancelation Policies :
Full Charge - Full Deposit - If canceled within 1 day of arrival

Terms and Conditions

The price includes the use of all bed linen, free WiFi and free tea/coffee and use of our kitchen facilities.
Please note we are a hostel for international backpackers only you must have a valid international passport for check in.

For payment we accept cash, Visa and MasterCard. 
All guests must pay a $1.00 pre-authorisation at check-in on a credit card. Guests who cannot provide a deposit by credit card will be denied entry. 

You must be at least 18 years old to stay at Chill Backpackers, we do not allow children.

Chill Backpackers is unable to guarantee all members of group bookings will be accommodated in the same room.
We offer discounted rates for in-house guests who book 7 days or more, these are non-refundable if you depart early.
Once the balance is paid and the reservation is checked in, all payments are non-refundable.

If you need any additional information, please don't hesitate to contact us at any time.

House rules:

1. No drugs in the hostel.
2. No smoking/vaping/lit flames indoors, there is a $1500 fine for triggering the fire alarm.
3. Visitors can come into the hostel only with permission from the reception until 9PM.
4. Please drink in moderation, if your drinking becomes a problem we will ask you to leave and you will not be refunded.
5. Your belongings are your responsibility. Keep your eyes on your things – we take no responsibility for lost or stolen items.
6. Let us know if you plan to stay longer than your reservation. If you don’t book ahead your bed may be sold to someone else.
7. If you are caught stealing someone else’s food or drink you will be immediately evicted.
8. We have the right to evict anyone for unlawful, inappropriate, violent or threatening behaviour. If you refuse to leave when asked, you are trespassing and we will call the police.
9. Management reserves the right to refuse entry to any guest at check-in.

These rules need to be respected by every guest at Chill Backpackers.

We want everyone to feel safe and welcome!
Please don’t hesitate to ask us for help or advice 

Chill Backpackers Management
